title: Landscape
creator_credit: Film Study Center, Harvard University, Robert Gardner and Jan Lenica
brief_description: Lenica described this animated film as a ‘night dream, a landscape of the mind, of my imagination’. Camera by James M. Shook, music by Garby Leon.
